name: Edu Portal for Dakshana Foundation
description: A platform designed for managing educational resources and student interactions, aimed at providing support for Dakshana scholars.
responsibilities: Developed the front-end using React and MUI components.
Implemented authentication and authorization with JWT.
Designed and integrated the database schema in MongoDB.
Handled file uploads and storage using AWS S3.
features: User registration and login with JWT authentication.
Admin dashboard for managing scholars and content.
File upload functionality with AWS S3 integration.
Real-time notifications for updates and messages.
challenges_faced: Optimizing real-time communication features for scalability.
Integrating file upload functionality with S3 storage.
Handling performance issues with large datasets.
outcome_impact: The platform successfully improved the management of educational resources, providing a streamlined experience for both admins and scholars.
